pageContext.claim: “So, they asked me that questions and for the most part to the best of my knowledge I think I've called every family of somebody that's died and it's the hardest call to make.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is backtracking on this claim. At first Trump said he called "virtually everybody." But several outlets have reported that many families have yet to hear from him. On Oct. 20 Roll Call reported that White House aides contacted the Defense Department for an up-to-date list of all the people who have during military service, aware that Trump overstated his claim.
